import React,{useContext}from'react';import{LanguageContext}from'../contexts/LanguageContext';// Path impor yang benar
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Legalities=_ref=>{let{legalities}=_ref;const{t}=useContext(LanguageContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"py-12 bg-gray-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-blue-900 mb-8 text-center",children:t('legalDocuments')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-lg",children:[legalities.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:legalities.map((doc,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-blue-50 rounded-lg shadow-md overflow-hidden transform hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:doc.imageUrl||"https://placehold.co/400x250/ADD8E6/000000?text=".concat(doc.title.replace(/\s/g,'+')),alt:doc.title,className:"w-full h-40 object-cover",onError:e=>{e.target.onerror=null;e.target.src="https://placehold.co/400x250/CCCCCC/000000?text=Dokumen";}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-blue-800 mb-2",children:doc.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-700 text-sm mb-3",children:doc.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:doc.fileUrl||'#',target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"inline-block bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors duration-300 text-sm",children:t('viewDocument')})]})]},index))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500 text-center",children:t('noLegalitiesFound')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-6 text-sm text-gray-500 text-center",children:["* ",t('legalitiesNote')]})]})]})});};export default Legalities;
